description: This file is a React component for the main page of a Next.js frontend application. It manages user authentication state, UI components for blog management (listing, editing, and creating blogs), and interacts with external API functions for user data and blog operations.

methods.name: Home
methods.description: Main React functional component representing the homepage layout and logic.

methods.name: handleGenerated
methods.description: Handles the event when a new blog draft is generated, setting the draft and opening the editor modal.

methods.name: handleOpenNew
methods.description: Prepares a new empty draft and opens the blog editor modal for creating a new blog.

methods.name: handleSaved
methods.description: Handles the save event, refreshing the blog list and resetting editing states.
